item.title: Buffer Overflow - The Basics
item.description: Introduction # In this blog we’ll explore the basics of buffer overflow, then we’ll gradually move to more advanced concepts of buffer overflow.

MY RESUME # I am Informatics and Computer Science Student with a strong background in data structures & algorithms, programming languages such as Python & C++ and experience in fullstack development working with cross-functional teams.
